dialogueLines.line: Hoho! It seems that finally a participant has arrived.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Where am I! And what? How did I get here?
dialogueLines.speaker: atlanta

dialogueLines.line: Hey! Why do our voices sound so similar?!
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: I'd *shore* like to know, not that it matters right now.
dialogueLines.speaker: atlanta

dialogueLines.line: So I *sea* you're the one behind all of this *sea*nanigans!
dialogueLines.speaker: atlanta

dialogueLines.line: Through trickery and illusion, twas it was I, Pris-ma.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma

dialogueLines.line: Well then, humour me. You 2D cretin.
dialogueLines.speaker: prisma
